roleset.name: involved, connected

example.name: both constituents in arg1
example.text: He 's a bit aggressive , raves and rants a lot , and mixes up a lot of different political stances into one bundle when-1 many are in no way related [*-1], but beyond that ....

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Even if people show up who you agree with on some political issue , ask yourselves if that issue is actually related to what the protest is about .
example.arg: to what the protest is about

roleset.name: having a familial relation

example.name: both args, MNR
example.text: It turned out that she was related to him by marriage
